name: 郭宏源
objective: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1. 常微分方程式之特殊解法，2. 拉普拉斯 (Laplace) 變換及其在電路上之應用，3. 傅立葉 (Fourier) 級數及轉換，4. 偏微分方程式
schedule:
01.Solving the Linear and Constant Coefficient DE
02.Annilator Approach
03.Variation of Parameters and Cauchy-Euler Equation
04.Solutions About Singular Points
05.Definition of the Laplace Transform
06.Inverse Laplace Transforms and Properties of Laplace Transforms
07.Properties of Laplace Transforms 
08.Laplace’s Equation 
09.Midterm Exam.
10.The Dirac Delta Function and Systems of Linear DEs
11.Orthogonal Functions
12.Fourier Series 
13.Fourier Cosine and Sine Series
14.Fourier Integral and Fourier Transforms
15.Fourier Transforms 
16.Partial Differential Equation
17.Separation of Variables for Solving  
18.Final Exam
scorePolicy:
平時: 30%
期中考: 35%
期末考: 35%
materials: Dennis G. Zill and Michael R. Cullen, "Differential Equations-with Boundary-Value Problem"
